mapper.sql: card, password, phone, name, addr, count, mail
mapper.select: SELECT card, password, phone, name, addr, count, mail FROM t_user ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user SET count = count - 1 WHERE phone IN ( SELECT per_tel FROM t_pack WHERE id = #{id} )
UPDATE t_user SET count = count + 1 WHERE phone IN ( SELECT per_tel FROM t_pack WHERE id = #{id} )
mapper.select: SELECT T2.mail mail , T1.code code , T1.addr addr , T1.org org FROM t_pack T1 LEFT JOIN t_user T2 ON T1.per_tel = T2.phone WHERE T1.id = #{id}
